```{r setup2, include=FALSE}
library(magrittr)
```

## What Pathway Methods can capture, within tissues

```{r capture, echo=FALSE}
keep = util$assocs_cov %>%
    group_by(m) %>%
    filter(any(-log10(adj.p) > 8)) %>%
    summarize(mlogp = -sum(log10(adj.p))) %>%
    arrange(-mlogp) %$%
    m

util$mutation_overview_plot(util$assocs_cov, keep)
```

```{r detail, echo=FALSE, fig.width=8, fig.height=10}
plots = lapply(keep, function(x) util$mutation_method_plot(x, util$assocs_cov))
plot_grid(plotlist=plots, ncol=4, label_size=8)
```

## What Pathway Methods can capture, between tissues

```{r capture_nocov, echo=FALSE}
keep = util$assocs_nocov %>%
    group_by(m) %>%
    filter(any(-log10(adj.p) > 15)) %>%
    summarize(mlogp = -sum(log10(adj.p))) %>%
    arrange(-mlogp) %$%
    m

util$mutation_overview_plot(util$assocs_nocov, keep)
```

```{r detail_nocov, echo=FALSE, fig.width=8, fig.height=10}
plots = lapply(keep, function(x) util$mutation_method_plot(x, util$assocs_nocov))
plot_grid(plotlist=plots, ncol=4, label_size=8)
```
